description:
This is a clip from yesterday's podcast release with John Rustad. In it, he and Dr. Peterson discuss the education system in Canada, how progressive ideology seeped in, and specifically who wields the power to accredit teachers.

Unlock the ad-free experience of The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast and dive into exclusive bonus content on DailyWire+. Start watching now: https://bit.ly/3KrWbS8

title: We Can Fix K-12 Education - Here’s How | John Rustad
